definitions.definition: To banish ; to drive or force (a person) from his own country ; to make an exile of.
To withdraw from one’s native country.
To renounce the rights and liabilities of citizenship where one is born and become a citizen of another country.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To banish ; to drive or force (a person) from his own country ; to make an exile of.
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To withdraw from one’s native country.
( intransitive ) To renounce the rights and liabilities of citizenship where one is born and become a citizen of another country.
